definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to be chosen/to be elected as
to take part in an election/to run for office
to choose for some purpose/to select and use

sentences.english: You may vote who sever side you like.
sentences.chinese: 你可以投票选你喜欢的任一方。

sentences.english: The clothes designer chose several models to try on his newly designed clothes.
sentences.chinese: 服装设计师选了几个模特来试穿他新设计的服装。

sentences.english: We chose a low sofa that does not block the views.
sentences.chinese: 我们选了一个很矮的沙发，不会挡住风景。

sentences.english: We make the retired official our head of the club.
sentences.chinese: 我们选退休的那位干部来当俱乐部的主任。

sentences.english: We elected her captain of our basketball team.
sentences.chinese: 我们选她当篮球队队长。

sentences.english: She advises keeping small talk finely tuned and topical.
sentences.chinese: 她建议闲聊时要定好调子选好话题。

sentences.english: The font tag has two required attributes and one optional one. They map directly to the three parameters in the java.awt.Font class
sentences.chinese: font标签有两个必需的属性和一个可选属性。

sentences.english: The city picked the site for the new museum.
sentences.chinese: 该市选这个地方来建新博物馆。

sentences.english: You chose that because you want to frighten me.
sentences.chinese: 你选了那个数字是因为你想要吓我。

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以选五花肉或瘦肉，中国的汉堡不输麦当劳。

sentences.english: If at all possible, choose a room with a great east facing window.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，就选一间窗朝东向的房间。

sentences.english: The status line is another optional component of an application window.
sentences.chinese: 状态行是应用程序窗口的另一个可选组件。

sentences.english: I can't make up my mind between these two dishes.
sentences.chinese: 这两道菜到底选哪一道，我拿不定主意。

sentences.english: However, Matthias is never mentioned again — God had already chosen Paul.
sentences.chinese: 但是，马提亚不再出现，神已经选了保罗。

sentences.english: CollationFor achieving the reliability of the collation, the original and the scenario were selected.
sentences.chinese: 校勘为保证校勘的可靠性，首先选好底本和校本。

definition: to win an election/to get a position by passing the imperial exam
to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
to choose by oneself/free to choose/optional/self-service
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
